title: I LOVE EVANGELE
body:
So I painted her my take on a young nami.
I tried to stick to youthful accessories to go with her younger face- but kept with the blue jewels by giving her a "starter" necklace and a beaded headband instead of her SR head gear. 
It's on 12" x 18" paper that i'm going to strap in between some cardboard and mail her on Monday as a declaration of my love for her.
O u O
